1.title: The Butterfly Effect

episode of.title: Kaijudo: Rise of the Duel Masters (TV Series 2012– )

1.plot: Ray, a 14-year-old who lives with his mom and grandfather, has been recruited by the Duel Masters to study KAIJUDO - "The Way of the Creature." They chose Ray for his natural talent as a creature tamer and duelist. Along with pals Allie and Gabe, Ray learns to work with the magical creatures... in their world. Each duel he fights yields new experience and allies in both worlds. The Veil, which has divided the two worlds for a thousand years, is crumbling. Hope lies with those who can masters the art of KAIJUDO.

24.title: Clash of the Monarchs

episode of.title: Kaijudo: Rise of the Duel Masters (TV Series 2012– )

24.plot: In an attempt to finally release Tritonus from the Choten?s control and stop the rising war in the Creature Realm, the Masters must gather all five Creature Monarchs and their Artifacts together in the Kaiju Null Zone for a ?Summit.?

25.title: Siege

episode of.title: Kaijudo: Rise of the Duel Masters (TV Series 2012– )

25.plot: The Choten?s plan for total conquest of both Realms is one step closer to reality, meanwhile the Kaijudo Adepts board his ship and discovers the intended use for the missing tanker of Evolution serum.

episode of.title: Kaijudo: Rise of the Duel Masters (TV Series 2012– )

23.plot: Ray, a 14-year-old who lives with his mom and grandfather, has been recruited by the Duel Masters to study KAIJUDO - "The Way of the Creature." They chose Ray for his natural talent as a creature tamer and duelist. Along with pals Allie and Gabe, Ray learns to work with the magical creatures... in their world. Each duel he fights yields new experience and allies in both worlds. The Veil, which has divided the two worlds for a thousand years, is crumbling. Hope lies with those who can masters the art of KAIJUDO.

imdb.title: Kaijudo: Rise of the Duel Masters
akas: Kaijudo: Rise of the Duel Masters (United States)
plot: The series follows the adventures of a young boy named Rai who possesses the rare ability to befriend and duel alongside fantastical creatures from a parallel dimension.
